ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added an Alignment style option, allowing you to position the find it panel on the right of your screen. This comes with its own column and row size option and is saved throughout sessions.
Added a Building Corner filter, allowing you to search for Left and Right corner buildings, as well as Front-only buildings.
Added a 'Random' button to select a random asset from the list. This comes with its own hot-key as well, Ctrl+R by default.
Added a marker next to assets showing that they are placed on the map, you can click this 'Locate' button to find the asset in the map.
Added a 'Clear Filters' button to easily reset all filters.
Updated translations.

ChangeGroups.Name: UI and UX Improvements
Changes: Arrow keys can now be used to navigate through the list of assets.
Added theme and pack icons on the right side of assets.
Fixed the previously selected asset not staying selected after closing and re-opening the find it panel.
Fixed changing display styles requiring two clicks to apply.
Various UI improvements; including better scaling, readability, positioning, and active color fix.

ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Fixed French Region Pack's office buildings showing up in specialized industries.
Fixed the filters not showing lot type.

ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Added the 'Asset Pack' to the filters list.

ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Compatibility with patch 1.1.10f1

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Fixed Chinese translations.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added suport for citizen props.
Small fixes and improvements.
Updated translations.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Prefab list now updates automatically when a prefab is created or updated.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added an automatic cleanup to fix the UI not appearing for some users.
Added partial support in the Editor, activate Find It and Picker using their hotkeys.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Fixed search and picker hotkeys not working.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Compatibility with patch 1.1.6.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Updated & fixed localizations.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added custom hotkey support in the mod's options.
Added a 'Global' theme filter to show assets that do not have any themes.

ChangeGroups.Name: New Features
Changes: Added a 'Theme' filter to only show European or North Amercian assets.

ChangeGroups.Name: Scroll Changes
Changes: Added a buffered delay to scrolling in an attempt to fix crashes when scrolling really fast.
Added an option, 'Fast & Smooth Scroll', to revert back to the previous scroll refresh rate.

ChangeGroups.Name: New Features
Changes: Added an option to hide Branding props from all views except their own sub-category.
Added an option to use a strict text search.
Added a Random asset filter that can be used if the corresponding option is not enabled.
Fixed Branding props appearing sometimes in other categories.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Small improvements in preparations for Asset Icon Library.

ChangeGroups.Name: New Additions
Changes: Added a Building Level filter.
Added a 'Small Grid' view style
Added a reset favorites button in the settings.

ChangeGroups.Name: Other Changes
Changes: The settings that change the Find It panel's size have been reworked into percetange-based sizes. This is to help maintain the same size while switching between different view styles.
Your last selected 'View Style' will now be remembered after restarting the game.
Icons on the top-right of assets now use the asset's sub-category icon instead of category icon.
Updated the icons for Residential, Industrial, and Commercial Props.
The 'Hide Random Assets' option is now disabled by default.

ChangeGroups.Name: New Filter & Sorting panel
Changes: Added a toggleable panel that includes various sorting & advanced filtering options.
Added a 'Grid with no text' view with large thumbnails for assets.
Added a 'List' view
Added a 'Sort by most used' sorting to quickly find assets you've used in your city.
Added a 'Sort by recently selected' sorting to easily go back to assets you last used.
Added a 'Base Game' & 'DLC' filter.
Added a 'No branding assets' filter to declutter your results from the thousands of ad assets.
Added a various filters for Buildings including 'Lot Depth', 'Lot Width' & 'Zone Type'.

ChangeGroups.Name: More Additions
Changes: Added an 'Expand' button to toggle between a small and larger view, which you can customise in the mod settings.
Added hundreds of missing assets.
Added an option to hide 'Random' assets, enabled by default.
Added a dice icon next to 'Random' assets.

ChangeGroups.Name: Other Changes
Changes: Updated various category icons.
Toggling to the terrain or zoning toolbars will now correctly dismiss Find It.
Fixed stutters happening when hovering over category buttons.
Fixed the scroll bar not correctly following your cursor if you have screen sizes other than 1080p.
Scroll bar height now reflects the amount of assets displayed.

ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Fixed the columns & rows not correctly aligning in some configurations.

ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Added Nature prop thumbnails.
Code Cleanup.

ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Potential fix for an indexing error / crash.
Updated icons for some sub-categories.

ChangeGroups.Name: Asset Changes
Changes: Added missing props, including decals, road signs, pillars, stops, and a few more.
Removed dangerous assets that cause crashes or that do not work.
Cleaned up some asset sub-categories.
